snippet.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II Official Story Trailer
snippet.description:
"War is a nasty business." 

Pre-order now: https://bit.ly/PreorderKCD2

Experience the chaos, brutality and intrigue of the realistic world of the late Middle Ages.

Henry, a young man seeking justice for his murdered parents, embarks on an epic adventure where his conscience, morality and integrity are put to the ultimate test.

As blood feuds and political conspiracy unfold, Henry's choices will shape his destiny. Fortune favours the brave – but every decision has a price.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance II arrives 4 February 2025 on PC, Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5.

KCD2 Social Media: 
X: https://x.com/WarhorseStudios
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kingdomcomerpg

Tik Tok: https://www.instagram.com/warhorsestudios/

#KCD2 #kingdomcomedeliverance  #medieval  #rpg  #warhorse
